input.sentences: i picked up a couple of articles at a yard sale .
this angel is my favorite | he looks very comfortable .
the lady was selling her collection of angels | so i could not resists .
i picked up all 4 of the ones that she had .
she also had a weird looking tiger and i bought that too !
output.sentences: On the table there was a painted angel figure played a musical instrument.
Across from it another angel figure, laid down to listen to it.
Above them a third figure seemed to stop and hear the music.
To the left a winged angel, picking flowers turned to notice.
In front of them all was the Jaguar, the animal the angel was playing for
